All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CheckinCommand
A command class for handling the check-in process in a hotel.
CheckoutCommand
A command class for handling the check-out process in a hotel.
Command
An abstract base class representing a generic command in the hotel system.
CommandDictionary
A utility class for creating a dictionary of commands by scanning for all subclasses of the Command interface in the specified package.
CSVHandler
The CSVHandler class is responsible for reading data from CSV files and returning the information in a structured format.
DateParser
The DateParser class is a utility class for parsing date strings into LocalDate objects.
Hotel
The Hotel class represents a hotel, storing rooms and providing methods for managing them.
ListCommand
A command that lists the details of all rooms in the Hotel.
Main
The main entry point for the hotel management application.
Map<K,V>
Interface representing a data structure for a map that stores key-value pairs.
MyMap<K,V>
A class implementing the Map interface.
PricesCommand
A command that displays the daily prices for all rooms in the Hotel.
Room
The Room class represents a hotel room, storing information about the room, such as its description, price, guests, check-in date, capacity, and duration of stay.
SaveCommand
A command that saves the current state of the Hotel into a CSV file.
ViewCommand
A command that allows the user to view details of a specific room in the Hotel.
